title: Daily Joys
text: I enjoy solving puzzles and playing Sudoku. I love learning languages, and I’m currently studying Spanish. I’m happiest outdoors—hiking, camping, and spending time in nature always refreshes me. I also love traveling and exploring new places, and one of my long-term goals is to visit all the national parks in the U.S. Outside of nature, my favorite places are bookstores and libraries. I love reading books, and I’m an animal person at heart—ducks are my favorite (though I generally adore all birds).

title: About Me
text:
I am passionate about natural resource management, water governance, and ecological conservation. With a strong academic background and an interest for finding innovative solutions to complex problems, I have consistently demonstrated my ability to analyze and evaluate data, communicate effectively, and collaborate with diverse teams. My expertise in GIS and data analysis has allowed me to develop innovative solutions to complex environmental problems. I am committed to utilizing my skills and experience to promote sustainable development and address pressing environmental issues.
EDUCATION

Ph.D. Watershed Science, Colorado State University, USA (2024-2029) Department of Ecosystem Science and Sustainability, GPA: 4.00/4.00
M.Sc. Geography, East Carolina University, Greenville, NC, USA (2022-2024) Department of Geography, Planning, Environment, GPA: 4.00/4.00

CERTIFICATIONS

Data Analysis Graduate Certificate (2024-2025) Colorado State University, Fort Collins, CO
Geographic Information Systems Professional Certification (GIS) - (2022-2024) East Carolina University, Greenville, NC
